00025 // Used to throw the appropriate error as noted by errno
00026 void ThrowError() throw (StorageKit::Error) {
00027     switch (errno) {
00028         case ENAMETOOLONG:
00029             throw new StorageKit::Error(errno, "Specified pathname is too long");
00030             break;
00031             
00032         default:
00033             throw new StorageKit::Error(errno);
00034             break;
00035     }
00036 }

00039 StorageKit::FileDescriptor StorageKit::Open(const char *path,
00040 StorageKit::OpenMode mode) throw (StorageKit::Error) {
00041     // Choose the proper posix flags
00042     int posix_flags;
00043     switch (mode) { 
00044         case READ: 
00045             posix_flags = O_RDONLY; // Read only
00046             break; 
00047         case WRITE: 
00048             posix_flags = O_WRONLY; // Write only 
00049             break; 
00050         case READ_WRITE: 
00051             posix_flags = O_RDWR;   // Read/Write
00052             break;       
00053     }
00054     
00055     // Add in O_CREAT so the file will be created if necessary
00056     posix_flags &= O_CREAT;
00057     
00058     // Choose rwxrwxrwx as default persmissions
00059     mode_t posix_mode = S_IRWXU | S_IRWXG | S_IRWXO;
00060     
00061     // Open the file
00062     FileDescriptor result = ::open(path, posix_flags, posix_mode);
00063     
00064     // Check for errors
00065     if (result == -1)
00066         ThrowError();
00067     
00068     return result;
00069 }

00072 int StorageKit::Close(StorageKit::FileDescriptor file) {
